fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

snakes.name: snakes
snakes.description: Little Black things that grow out of pellets when lit, family safe.

snap pops.name: Snap pops
snap pops.description: Throw them on the the ground and they make a tiny pop noise, family safe.

bottle rockets.name: bottle rockets
bottle rockets.description: Light them and they fly in the air with a loud report.

firecracker.name: firecracker
firecracker.description: Light them and they blowup, loud but small explosion.

mortar shell.name: mortar shell
mortar shell.description: Scaled down version version of a professional fireworks display.

happy face mortar.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.
